column1: Smoque BBQ////I have been to Smoque more than several times over the past few years and I have never been disapointed.  The ribs are the best that I've ever had in Chicago
column2: always tender.  The beans are good
column3: the french fries pretty crispy.  The brisket is good too but not my favorite cut of meat.  The pulled-pork is good too.
